channel.title: Dueling Option - VERY IMPORTANT
channel.description: Okay well I know dodian had an option where you could right click on a player and challenge them to a duel. I've been wanting to add this into my server for a long time now and could never figure it out. Does anyone know the full dueling coding and where to put it all? This would help me out VERY MUCH and I would VERY MUCH APPRECIATE IT. I would offer something but I can't bribe so if you could help me that would be great! Thanks!

item.title: Dueling Option - VERY IMPORTANT
item.dc:creator: @Halflingblade Halflingblade
item.description:
@Halflingblade wrote:

Okay well I know dodian had an option where you could right click on a player and challenge them to a duel. I’ve been wanting to add this into my server for a long time now and could never figure it out. Does anyone know the full dueling coding and where to put it all?
